attributes.review: Omg I cannot believe this app exists. It is full of fake news. I was just trying to get on here to prove to liberals that TRUMP is actually Jesus himself and then when I clicked download it asked for my address and told me a MASK was on its way. THEN it showed me a quote by Trump that said he only ran as a republican because we would be DUMB ENOUGH to vote for him!! The audacity!! WORST APP EVER. I worshiped this man but I am done now. I will not be called stupid.
attributes.title: THIS APP MADE ME ORDER A MASK
